notes.text:
Worst climb yet, played aliens from plat 4 to leg only to constantly get cucked by various otks, so i busted out this piece of art once more
From then I only had to fk up my KoG promo 3 times and here we are
Obv has an insane advantage over sylvans and apart from aliens there really isnt a bad match-up for this deck
No trunade since, again, I faced mostly sylvans and ca and trunade is useless against those
Extra consists of a THICC prisma ojama king and some roids, couldnt have done it without them
